notices.title: Artifacts remain non-custodial
notices.summary: Federated index entries link to public data only; no keys or credentials are stored.
notices.guidance: Verify hashes before distributing artifacts to downstream mirrors.

notices.title: Attestation-only signing flow
notices.summary: Signing infrastructure operates in attest-only mode; financial transactions are blocked by policy.
notices.guidance: Escalate to governance if a transaction request is observed in the queue.

notices.title: Supply chain integrity checks
notices.summary: Dependency locks are monitored; unexpected hashes require investigation before deployment.
notices.guidance: Run the integrity verifier prior to federation pushes.
